key.name: grade
key.description: An approximate measure of how hard the generated random puzzles will be to solve.

key.name: rows
key.description: The number of rows of cells in the puzzle grid.

key.name: columns
key.description: The number of columns of cells in the puzzle grid.

key.name: clue-help
key.description: Use strikethrough for each contiguous completed block from edge in clue label. Mark clue in red if there is a definite error in the corresponding region. Fade clue if corresponding region is completed without definite error.

key.name: mode
key.description: Whether the game is in the setting or solving mode.

key.name: window-x
key.description: The x-coordinate of the window origin, or -1000 for centre window.

key.name: window-y
key.description: The x-coordinate of the window origin, or -1000 for centre window.

key.name: font-height
key.description: The height of the font used for clues, or -100 for default for screen and grid.

key.name: current-game-path
key.summary: Path to game currently being played
key.description: The location where the current game is stored (if it is not an unsaved game).
